method.name: clear_bones
method.description: Clear all the bones in this skeleton.

method.name: find_bone
method.description: Return the bone index that matches "name" as its name.

method.name: get_bone_count
method.description: Return the amount of bones in the skeleton.

method.name: get_bone_name
method.description: Return the name of the bone at index "index"

method.name: get_bone_parent
method.description: Return the bone index which is the parent of the bone at "bone_idx". If -1, then bone has no parent. Note that the parent bone returned will always be less than "bone_idx".

method.name: get_bone_pose
method.description: Return the pose transform for bone "bone_idx".

method.name: get_bone_rest
method.description: Return the rest transform for a bone "bone_idx".

method.name: get_bound_child_nodes_to_bone
method.description: Deprecated soon.

method.name: set_bone_parent
method.description: Set the bone index "parent_idx" as the parent of the bone at "bone_idx". If -1, then bone has no parent. Note: "parent_idx" must be less than "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_pose
method.description: Return the pose transform for bone "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_rest
method.description: Set the rest transform for bone "bone_idx"

method.name: unbind_child_node_from_bone
method.description: Deprecated soon.

class.name: Slider
class.description: Base class for GUI Sliders.

method.name: get_ticks
method.description: Return amounts of ticks to display on slider.

method.name: get_ticks_on_borders
method.description: Return true if ticks are visible on borders.

method.name: set_ticks
method.description: Set amount of ticks to display in slider.

method.name: set_ticks_on_borders
method.description: Set true if ticks are visible on borders.

class.name: Spatial
class.description: Spatial is the base for every type of 3D [Node]. It contains a 3D [Transform] which can be set or get as local or global. If a Spatial [Node] has Spatial children, their transforms will be relative to the parent.

method.name: get_global_transform
method.description: Return the global transform, relative to worldspace.

method.name: get_parent_spatial
method.description: Return the parent [Spatial], or an empty [Object] if no parent exists or parent is not of type [Spatial].

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Return the local transform, relative to the bone parent.

method.name: set_global_transform
method.description: Set the transform globally, relative to worldspace.

method.name: set_transform
method.description: Set the transform locally, relative to the parent spatial node.

constants.constant: Spatial nodes receive this notification with their global transform changes. This means that either the current or a parent node changed its transform.

class.name: SpinBox
class.description: SpinBox is a numerical input text field. It allows entering integers and floats.

method.name: get_suffix
method.description: Return the specific suffix.

method.name: is_editable
method.description: Return if the spinbox is editable.

method.name: set_editable
method.description: Set whether the spinbox is editable.

method.name: set_prefix
method.description: Set a prefix.

method.name: set_suffix
method.description: Set a specific suffix.

class.name: SplitContainer
class.description: Container for splitting two controls vertically or horizontally, with a grabber that allows adjusting the split offset or ratio.

method.name: get_dragger_visibility
method.description: Return visibility of the split dragger (one of [DRAGGER_VISIBLE], [DRAGGER_HIDDEN] or [DRAGGER_HIDDEN_COLLAPSED]).

method.name: get_split_offset
method.description: Return the split offset.

method.name: is_collapsed
method.description: Return true if the split is collapsed.

method.name: set_collapsed
method.description: Set if the split must be collapsed.

method.name: set_dragger_visibility
method.description: Set visibility of the split dragger ([i]mode[/i] must be one of [DRAGGER_VISIBLE], [DRAGGER_HIDDEN] or [DRAGGER_HIDDEN_COLLAPSED]).

method.name: set_split_offset
method.description: Set the split offset.

signal.name: dragged
signal.description: Emitted when the dragger is dragged by user.

constants.constant: The split dragger is invisible and collapsed.

class.name: SpotLight
class.brief_description: Spotlight [Light], such as a reflector spotlight or a lantern.
class.description: A SpotLight light is a type of [Light] node that emits lights in a specific direction, in the shape of a cone. The light is attenuated through the distance and this attenuation can be configured by changing the energy, radius and attenuation parameters of [Light]. TODO: Image of a spotlight.

class.name: Sprite
class.description: General purpose Sprite node. This Sprite node can show any texture as a sprite. The texture can be used as a spritesheet for animation, or only a region from a bigger texture can referenced, like an atlas.

method.name: get_frame
method.description: Return the texture frame for a sprite-sheet, works when vframes or hframes are greater than 1.

method.name: get_hframes
method.description: Return the amount of horizontal frames. See [method set_hframes].

method.name: get_offset
method.description: Return sprite draw offset.

method.name: get_region_rect
method.description: Return the region rect to read from.

method.name: get_texture
method.description: Return the base texture for the sprite.

method.name: get_vframes
method.description: Return the amount of vertical frames. See [method set_vframes].

method.name: is_centered
method.description: Return if the sprite is centered at the local origin.

method.name: is_flipped_h
method.description: Return true if the sprite is flipped horizontally.

method.name: is_flipped_v
method.description: Return true if the sprite is flipped vertically.

method.name: is_region
method.description: Return if the sprite reads from a region.

method.name: set_centered
method.description: Set whether the sprite should be centered on the origin.

method.name: set_flip_h
method.description: Set true to flip the sprite horizontally.

method.name: set_flip_v
method.description: Set true to flip the sprite vertically.

method.name: set_frame
method.description: Set the texture frame for a sprite-sheet, works when vframes or hframes are greater than 1.

method.name: set_hframes
method.description: Set the amount of horizontal frames and converts the sprite into a sprite-sheet. This is useful for animation.

method.name: set_offset
method.description: Set the sprite draw offset, useful for setting rotation pivots.

method.name: set_region
method.description: Set the sprite as a sub-region of a bigger texture. Useful for texture-atlases.

method.name: set_region_rect
method.description: Set the region rect to read from.

method.name: set_texture
method.description: Set the base texture for the sprite.

method.name: set_vframes
method.description: Set the amount of vertical frames and converts the sprite into a sprite-sheet. This is useful for animation.

class.name: SpriteFrames
class.description: Sprite frame library for [AnimatedSprite].

class.name: StaticBody
class.description: Static body for 3D Physics. A static body is a simple body that is not intended to move. They don't consume any CPU resources in contrast to a [RigidBody3D] so they are great for scenario collision. A static body can also be animated by using simulated motion mode. This is useful for implementing functionalities such as moving platforms. When this mode is active the body can be animated and automatically computes linear and angular velocity to apply in that frame and to influence other bodies. Alternatively, a constant linear or angular velocity can be set for the static body, so even if it doesn't move, it affects other bodies as if it was moving (this is useful for simulating conveyor belts or conveyor wheels).

method.name: get_bounce
method.description: Return the body bounciness.

method.name: get_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Return the constant angular velocity for the body.

method.name: get_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Return the constant linear velocity for the body.

method.name: get_friction
method.description: Return the body friction.

method.name: set_bounce
method.description: Set the body bounciness, from 0 (not bouncy) to 1 (bouncy).

method.name: set_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Set a constant angular velocity for the body. This does not rotate the body, but affects other bodies touching it, as if it was rotating.

method.name: set_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Set a constant linear velocity for the body. This does not move the body, but affects other bodies touching it, as if it was moving.

method.name: set_friction
method.description: Set the body friction, from 0 (frictionless) to 1 (full friction).

class.name: StaticBody2D
class.description: Static body for 2D Physics. A static body is a simple body that is not intended to move. They don't consume any CPU resources in contrast to a [RigidBody2D] so they are great for scenario collision. A static body can also be animated by using simulated motion mode. This is useful for implementing functionalities such as moving platforms. When this mode is active the body can be animated and automatically computes linear and angular velocity to apply in that frame and to influence other bodies. Alternatively, a constant linear or angular velocity can be set for the static body, so even if it doesn't move, it affects other bodies as if it was moving (this is useful for simulating conveyor belts or conveyor wheels).

method.name: get_bounce
method.description: Return the body bounciness.

method.name: get_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Return the constant angular velocity for the body.

method.name: get_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Return the constant linear velocity for the body.

method.name: get_friction
method.description: Return the body friction.

method.name: set_bounce
method.description: Set the body bounciness, from 0 (not bouncy) to 1 (bouncy).

method.name: set_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Set a constant angular velocity for the body. This does not rotate the body, but affects other bodies touching it, as if it was rotating.

method.name: set_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Set a constant linear velocity for the body. This does not move the body, but affects other bodies touching it, as if it was moving.

method.name: set_friction
method.description: Set the body friction, from 0 (frictionless) to 1 (full friction).

class.name: StreamPeer
class.brief_description: Abstraction and base class for stream-based protocols.
class.description: StreamPeer is an abstraction and base class for stream-based protocols (such as TCP or Unix Sockets). It provides an API for sending and receiving data through streams as raw data or strings.

method.name: get_16
method.description: Get a signed 16 bit value from the stream.

method.name: get_32
method.description: Get a signed 32 bit value from the stream.

method.name: get_64
method.description: Get a signed 64 bit value from the stream.

method.name: get_8
method.description: Get a signed byte from the stream.

method.name: get_available_bytes
method.description: Return the amount of bytes this [StreamPeer] has available.

method.name: get_data
method.description: Return a chunk data with the received bytes. The amount of bytes to be received can be requested in the "bytes" argument. If not enough bytes are available, the function will block until the desired amount is received. This function returns two values, an Error code and a data array.

method.name: get_double
method.description: Get a double-precision float from the stream.

method.name: get_float
method.description: Get a single-precision float from the stream.

method.name: get_partial_data
method.description: Return a chunk data with the received bytes. The amount of bytes to be received can be requested in the "bytes" argument. If not enough bytes are available, the function will return how many were actually received. This function returns two values, an Error code, and a data array.

method.name: get_string
method.description: Get a string with byte-length "bytes" from the stream.

method.name: get_u16
method.description: Get an unsigned 16 bit value from the stream.

method.name: get_u32
method.description: Get an unsigned 32 bit value from the stream.

method.name: get_u64
method.description: Get an unsigned 16 bit value from the stream.

method.name: get_u8
method.description: Get an unsigned byte from the stream.

method.name: get_utf8_string
method.description: Get an utf8 string with byte-length "bytes" from the stream (this decodes the string sent as utf8).

method.name: get_var
method.description: Get a Variant from the stream.

method.name: is_big_endian_enabled
method.description: Return whether this [StreamPeer] is using big-endian format.

method.name: put_16
method.description: Put a signed 16 bit value into the stream.

method.name: put_32
method.description: Put a signed 32 bit value into the stream.

method.name: put_64
method.description: Put a signed 64 bit value into the stream.

method.name: put_8
method.description: Put a signed byte into the stream.

method.name: put_data
method.description: Send a chunk of data through the connection, blocking if necessary until the data is done sending. This function returns an Error code.

method.name: put_double
method.description: Put a double-precision float into the stream.

method.name: put_float
method.description: Put a single-precision float into the stream.

method.name: put_partial_data
method.description: Send a chunk of data through the connection, if all the data could not be sent at once, only part of it will. This function returns two values, an Error code and an integer, describing how much data was actually sent.

method.name: put_u16
method.description: Put an unsigned 16 bit value into the stream.

method.name: put_u32
method.description: Put an unsigned 32 bit value into the stream.

method.name: put_u64
method.description: Put an unsigned 64 bit value into the stream.

method.name: put_u8
method.description: Put an unsigned byte into the stream.

method.name: put_utf8_string
method.description: Put a zero-terminated utf8 string into the stream.

method.name: put_var
method.description: Put a Variant into the stream.

method.name: set_big_endian
method.description: Set this [StreamPeer] to use big-endian format. Default is false.

class.name: StreamPeerSSL
class.description: SSL Stream peer. This object can be used to connect to SSL servers.

method.name: connect_to_stream
method.description: Connect to a peer using an underlying [StreamPeer] "stream", when "validate_certs" is true, [StreamPeerSSL] will validate that the certificate presented by the peer matches the "for_hostname".

method.name: disconnect_from_stream
method.description: Disconnect from host.

method.name: get_status
method.description: Return the status of the connection, one of STATUS_* enum.

constants.constant: A status representing a [StreamPeerSSL] that is disconnected.
A status representing a [StreamPeerSSL] that is connected to a host.
An errot status that shows the peer did not present a SSL certificate and validation was requested.
An error status that shows a mismatch in the SSL certificate domain presented by the host and the domain requested for validation.

class.name: StreamPeerTCP
class.description: TCP Stream peer. This object can be used to connect to TCP servers, or also is returned by a tcp server.

method.name: connect_to_host
method.description: Connect to the specified host:port pair. A hostname will be resolved if valid. Returns [OK] on success or [FAILED] on failure.

method.name: disconnect_from_host
method.description: Disconnect from host.

method.name: get_connected_host
method.description: Return the IP of this peer.

method.name: get_connected_port
method.description: Return the port of this peer.

method.name: get_status
method.description: Return the status of the connection, one of STATUS_* enum.

constants.constant: The initial status of the [StreamPeerTCP], also the status after a disconnect.
A status representing a [StreamPeerTCP] that is connecting to a host.
A status representing a [StreamPeerTCP] that is connected to a host.
A staus representing a [StreamPeerTCP] in error state.

class.name: String
class.description: This is the built-in string class (and the one used by GDScript). It supports Unicode and provides all necessary means for string handling. Strings are reference counted and use a copy-on-write approach, so passing them around is cheap in resources.

method.name: begins_with
method.description: Return true if the strings begins with the given string.

method.name: bigrams
method.description: Return the bigrams (pairs of consecutive letters) of this string.

method.name: c_escape
method.description: Return a copy of the string with special characters escaped using the C language standard.

method.name: c_unescape
method.description: Return a copy of the string with escaped characters replaced by their meanings according to the C language standard.

method.name: capitalize
method.description: Change the case of some letters. Replace underscores with spaces, convert all letters to lowercase then capitalize first and every letter following the space character. For [code]capitalize camelCase mixed_with_underscores[/code] it will return [code]Capitalize Camelcase Mixed With Underscores[/code].

method.name: casecmp_to
method.description: Perform a case-sensitive comparison to another string, return -1 if less, 0 if equal and +1 if greater.

method.name: empty
method.description: Return true if the string is empty.

method.name: ends_with
method.description: Return true if the strings ends with the given string.

method.name: erase
method.description: Erase [code]chars[/code] characters from the string starting from [code]pos[/code].

method.name: find
method.description: Find the first occurrence of a substring, return the starting position of the substring or -1 if not found. Optionally, the initial search index can be passed.

method.name: find_last
method.description: Find the last occurrence of a substring, return the starting position of the substring or -1 if not found. Optionally, the initial search index can be passed.

method.name: findn
method.description: Find the first occurrence of a substring but search as case-insensitive, return the starting position of the substring or -1 if not found. Optionally, the initial search index can be passed.

method.name: get_base_dir
method.description: If the string is a path to a file, return the base directory.

method.name: get_basename
method.description: If the string is a path to a file, return the path to the file without the extension.

method.name: get_extension
method.description: If the string is a path to a file, return the extension.

method.name: get_file
method.description: If the string is a path to a file, return the file and ignore the base directory.

method.name: hash
method.description: Hash the string and return a 32 bits integer.

method.name: hex_to_int
method.description: Convert a string containing an hexadecimal number into an int.

method.name: insert
method.description: Insert a substring at a given position.

method.name: is_abs_path
method.description: If the string is a path to a file or directory, return true if the path is absolute.

method.name: is_rel_path
method.description: If the string is a path to a file or directory, return true if the path is relative.

method.name: is_subsequence_of
method.description: Check whether this string is a subsequence of the given string.

method.name: is_subsequence_ofi
method.description: Check whether this string is a subsequence of the given string, without considering case.

method.name: is_valid_float
method.description: Check whether the string contains a valid float.

method.name: is_valid_html_color
method.description: Check whether the string contains a valid color in HTML notation.

method.name: is_valid_identifier
method.description: Check whether the string is a valid identifier. As is common in programming languages, a valid identifier may contain only letters, digits and underscores (_) and the first character may not be a digit.

method.name: is_valid_integer
method.description: Check whether the string contains a valid integer.

method.name: is_valid_ip_address
method.description: Check whether the string contains a valid IP address.

method.name: json_escape
method.description: Return a copy of the string with special characters escaped using the JSON standard.

method.name: left
method.description: Return an amount of characters from the left of the string.

method.name: length
method.description: Return the length of the string in characters.

method.name: match
method.description: Do a simple expression match, where '*' matches zero or more arbitrary characters and '?' matches any single character except '.'.

method.name: matchn
method.description: Do a simple case insensitive expression match, using ? and * wildcards (see [method match]).

method.name: md5_buffer
method.description: Return the MD5 hash of the string as an array of bytes.

method.name: md5_text
method.description: Return the MD5 hash of the string as a string.

method.name: nocasecmp_to
method.description: Perform a case-insensitive comparison to another string, return -1 if less, 0 if equal and +1 if greater.

method.name: ord_at
method.description: Return the character code at position [code]at[/code].

method.name: pad_decimals
method.description: Format a number to have an exact number of [code]digits[/code] after the decimal point.

method.name: pad_zeros
method.description: Format a number to have an exact number of [code]digits[/code] before the decimal point.

method.name: percent_decode
method.description: Decode a percent-encoded string. See [method percent_encode].

method.name: percent_encode
method.description: Percent-encode a string. This is meant to encode parameters in a URL when sending a HTTP GET request and bodies of form-urlencoded POST request.

method.name: plus_file
method.description: If the string is a path, this concatenates [code]file[/code] at the end of the string as a subpath. E.g. [code]"this/is".plus_file("path") == "this/is/path"[/code].

method.name: replace
method.description: Replace occurrences of a substring for different ones inside the string.

method.name: replacen
method.description: Replace occurrences of a substring for different ones inside the string, but search case-insensitive.

method.name: rfind
method.description: Perform a search for a substring, but start from the end of the string instead of the beginning.

method.name: rfindn
method.description: Perform a search for a substring, but start from the end of the string instead of the beginning. Also search case-insensitive.

method.name: right
method.description: Return the right side of the string from a given position.

method.name: sha256_text
method.description: Return the SHA-256 hash of the string as a string.

method.name: similarity
method.description: Return the similarity index of the text compared to this string. 1 means totally similar and 0 means totally dissimilar.

method.name: split
method.description: Split the string by a divisor string, return an array of the substrings. Example "One,Two,Three" will return ["One","Two","Three"] if split by ",".

method.name: split_floats
method.description: Split the string in floats by using a divisor string, return an array of the substrings. Example "1,2.5,3" will return [1,2.5,3] if split by ",".

method.name: strip_edges
method.description: Return a copy of the string stripped of any non-printable character at the beginning and the end. The optional arguments are used to toggle stripping on the left and right edges respectively.

method.name: substr
method.description: Return part of the string from the position [code]from[/code], with length [code]len[/code].

method.name: to_ascii
method.description: Convert the String (which is a character array) to PoolByteArray (which is an array of bytes). The conversion is speeded up in comparison to to_utf8() with the assumption that all the characters the String contains are only ASCII characters.

method.name: to_float
method.description: Convert a string, containing a decimal number, into a [code]float[/code].

method.name: to_int
method.description: Convert a string, containing an integer number, into an [code]int[/code].

method.name: to_lower
method.description: Return the string converted to lowercase.

method.name: to_upper
method.description: Return the string converted to uppercase.

method.name: to_utf8
method.description: Convert the String (which is an array of characters) to PoolByteArray (which is an array of bytes). The conversion is a bit slower than to_ascii(), but supports all UTF-8 characters. Therefore, you should prefer this function over to_ascii().

method.name: xml_escape
method.description: Return a copy of the string with special characters escaped using the XML standard.

method.name: xml_unescape
method.description: Return a copy of the string with escaped characters replaced by their meanings according to the XML standard.

class.name: StyleBox
class.brief_description: Base class for drawing stylized boxes for the UI.
class.description: StyleBox is [Resource] that provides an abstract base class for drawing stylized boxes for the UI. StyleBoxes are used for drawing the styles of buttons, line edit backgrounds, tree backgrounds, etc. and also for testing a transparency mask for pointer signals. If mask test fails on a StyleBox assigned as mask to a control, clicks and motion signals will go through it to the one below.

method.name: get_default_margin
method.description: Return the default offset of the margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum) of a StyleBox, Controls that draw styleboxes with context inside need to know the margin, so the border of the stylebox is not occluded.

method.name: get_margin
method.description: Return the offset of margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum).

method.name: get_minimum_size
method.description: Return the minimum size that this stylebox can be shrunk to.

method.name: get_offset
method.description: Return the "offset" of a stylebox, this is a helper function, like writing [code]Vector2(style.get_margin(MARGIN_LEFT), style.get_margin(MARGIN_TOP))[/code].

method.name: set_default_margin
method.description: Set the default offset "offset" of the margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum) for a StyleBox, Controls that draw styleboxes with context inside need to know the margin, so the border of the stylebox is not occluded.

method.name: test_mask
method.description: Test a position in a rectangle, return whether it passes the mask test.

class.name: StyleBoxEmpty
class.description: Empty stylebox (really does not display anything).

class.name: StyleBoxFlat
class.description: Stylebox of a single color. Displays the stylebox of a single color, alternatively a border with light/dark colors can be assigned.

class.name: StyleBoxTexture
class.description: Texture Based 3x3 scale style. This stylebox performs a 3x3 scaling of a texture, where only the center cell is fully stretched. This allows for the easy creation of bordered styles.

class.name: SurfaceTool
class.description: Helper tool to create geometry.

class.name: TCP_Server
class.description: TCP Server class. Listens to connections on a port and returns a [StreamPeerTCP] when got a connection.

method.name: is_connection_available
method.description: Return true if a connection is available for taking.

method.name: listen
method.description: Listen on the "port" binding to "bind_address". If "bind_address" is set as "*" (default), the server will listen on all available addresses (both IPv4 and IPv6). If "bind_address" is set as "0.0.0.0" (for IPv4) or "::" (for IPv6), the server will listen on all available addresses matching that IP type. If "bind_address" is set to any valid address (e.g. "192.168.1.101", "::1", etc), the server will only listen on the interface with that addresses (or fail if no interface with the given address exists).

method.name: stop
method.description: Stop listening.

method.name: take_connection
method.description: If a connection is available, return a StreamPeerTCP with the connection/

class.name: TabContainer
class.description: Tabbed Container. Contains several children controls, but shows only one at the same time. Clicking on the top tabs allows to change the currently visible one. Children controls of this one automatically.

method.name: are_tabs_visible
method.description: Return whether the tabs should be visible or hidden.

method.name: get_current_tab
method.description: Return the current tab index that is being shown.

method.name: get_previous_tab
method.description: Return the previous tab index that was being shown.

method.name: get_tab_align
method.description: Return tab alignment, from the ALIGN_* enum.

method.name: get_tab_control
method.description: Return the current tab control that is being shown.

method.name: get_tab_count
method.description: Return the amount of tabs.

method.name: get_tab_title
method.description: Return the title for the tab. Tab titles are by default the children node name, but this can be overridden.

method.name: set_current_tab
method.description: Bring a tab (and the Control it represents) to the front, and hide the rest.

method.name: set_tab_align
method.description: Set tab alignment, from the ALIGN_* enum. Moves tabs to the left, right or center.

method.name: set_tab_icon
method.description: Set an icon for a tab.

method.name: set_tab_title
method.description: Set a title for the tab. Tab titles are by default the children node name, but this can be overridden.

method.name: set_tabs_visible
method.description: Set whether the tabs should be visible or hidden.

signal.name: tab_changed
signal.description: Emitted only when the current tab changes.

signal.name: tab_selected
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is being selected, even if it is the same tab.

class.name: Tabs
class.description: Simple tabs control, similar to [TabContainer] but is only in charge of drawing tabs, not interact with children.

class.name: TestCube
class.brief_description: A simple cube used for testing in 3D.
class.description: The TestCube is a simple 2x2x2 cube with a basic texture. It can be used as a placeholder, to verify how the lighting looks, to test shaders, or any other task you may need a textured model to test with.

class.name: TextEdit
class.description: TextEdit is meant for editing large, multiline text. It also has facilities for editing code, such as syntax highlighting support and multiple levels of undo/redo.

method.name: add_color_region
method.description: Add color region (given the delimiters) and its colors.

method.name: add_keyword_color
method.description: Add a keyword and its color.

method.name: clear_colors
method.description: Clear all the syntax coloring information.

method.name: clear_undo_history
method.description: Clear the undo history.

method.name: copy
method.description: Copy the current selection.

method.name: cursor_get_blink_enabled
method.description: Gets whether the text editor caret is blinking.

method.name: cursor_get_blink_speed
method.description: Gets the text editor caret blink speed.

method.name: cursor_get_column
method.description: Return the column the editing cursor is at.

method.name: cursor_get_line
method.description: Return the line the editing cursor is at.

method.name: cursor_is_block_mode
method.description: Gets whether the text editor caret is in block mode.

method.name: cursor_set_blink_enabled
method.description: Set the text editor caret to blink.

method.name: cursor_set_blink_speed
method.description: Set the text editor caret blink speed. Cannot be less then or equal to 0.

method.name: cursor_set_block_mode
method.description: Set the text editor caret to block mode.

method.name: cut
method.description: Cut the current selection.

method.name: get_line
method.description: Return the text of a specific line.

method.name: get_line_count
method.description: Return the amount of total lines in the text.

method.name: get_selection_from_column
method.description: Return the selection begin column.

method.name: get_selection_from_line
method.description: Return the selection begin line.

method.name: get_selection_text
method.description: Return the text inside the selection.

method.name: get_selection_to_column
method.description: Return the selection end column.

method.name: get_selection_to_line
method.description: Return the selection end line.

method.name: get_text
method.description: Return the whole text.

method.name: insert_text_at_cursor
method.description: Insert a given text at the cursor position.

method.name: is_highlight_all_occurrences_enabled
method.description: Returns true if highlight all occurrences is enabled.

method.name: is_selection_active
method.description: Return true if the selection is active.

method.name: is_show_line_numbers_enabled
method.description: Returns true if line numbers are enabled.

method.name: is_syntax_coloring_enabled
method.description: Return true if the syntax coloring is enabled.

method.name: paste
method.description: Paste the current selection.

method.name: redo
method.description: Perform redo operation.

method.name: search
method.description: Perform a search inside the text. Search flags can be specified in the SEARCH_* enum.

method.name: select
method.description: Perform selection, from line/column to line/column.

method.name: select_all
method.description: Select all the text.

method.name: set_highlight_all_occurrences
method.description: Set to enable highlighting all occurrences of the current selection.

method.name: set_max_chars
method.description: Set the maximum amount of characters editable.

method.name: set_readonly
method.description: Set the text editor as read-only. Text can be displayed but not edited.

method.name: set_show_line_numbers
method.description: Set to enable showing line numbers.

method.name: set_syntax_coloring
method.description: Set to enable the syntax coloring.

method.name: set_text
method.description: Set the entire text.

method.name: set_wrap
method.description: Enable text wrapping when it goes beyond he edge of what is visible.

method.name: undo
method.description: Perform undo operation.

signal.name: breakpoint_toggled
signal.description: Emitted when a breakpoint is placed via the breakpoint gutter.

signal.name: cursor_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the cursor changes.

signal.name: text_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the text changes.

class.name: Texture
class.description: A texture works by registering an image in the video hardware, which then can be used in 3D models or 2D [Sprite] or GUI [Control].

method.name: get_flags
method.description: Return the current texture flags.

method.name: get_height
method.description: Return the texture height.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Return the texture size.

method.name: get_width
method.description: Return the texture width.

method.name: set_flags
method.description: Change the texture flags.

constants.constant: Generate mipmaps, to enable smooth zooming out of the texture.
Turn on magnifying filter, to enable smooth zooming in of the texture.
Default flags. Generate mipmaps, repeat, and filter are enabled.

class.name: TextureButton
class.brief_description: Button that can be themed with textures.
class.description: Button that can be themed with textures. This is like a regular [Button] but can be themed by assigning textures to it. This button is intended to be easy to theme, however a regular button can expand (that uses styleboxes) and still be better if the interface is expect to have internationalization of texts. Only the normal texture is required, the others are optional.

class.name: TextureProgress
class.description: [ProgressBar] implementation that is easier to theme (by just passing a few textures).

class.name: TextureRect
class.brief_description: Control Frame that draws a texture.
class.description: Control frame that simply draws an assigned texture. It can stretch or not. It's a simple way to just show an image in a UI.

class.name: Theme
class.description: Theme for skinning controls. Controls can be skinned individually, but for complex applications it's more efficient to just create a global theme that defines everything. This theme can be applied to any [Control], and it and its children will automatically use it. Theme resources can be alternatively loaded by writing them in a .theme file, see docs for more info.

class.name: Thread
class.brief_description: A unit of execution in a process.
class.description: A unit of execution in a process. Can run methods on [Object]s simultaneously. The use of synchronization via [Mutex], [Semaphore] is advised if working with shared objects.

method.name: get_id
method.description: Return the id of the thread, uniquely identifying it among all threads.

method.name: is_active
method.description: Whether this thread is currently active, an active Thread cannot start work on a new method but can be joined with [method wait_to_finish].

method.name: start
method.description: Start a new [Thread], it will run "method" on object "instance" using "userdata" as an argument and running with "priority", one of PRIORITY_* enum. Returns OK on success, or ERR_CANT_CREATE on failure.

method.name: wait_to_finish
method.description: Joins the [Thread] and waits for it to finish. Returns what the method called returned.

class.name: TileMap
class.description: Node for 2D tile-based games. Tilemaps use a [TileSet] which contain a list of tiles (textures, their rect and a collision) and are used to create complex grid-based maps. To optimize drawing and culling (sort of like [GridMap]), you can specify a quadrant size, so chunks of the map will be batched together at drawing time.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clear all cells.

method.name: get_cell
method.description: Return the tile index of the referenced cell.

method.name: get_cell_size
method.description: Return the cell size.

method.name: get_cellv
method.description: Return the tile index of the cell referenced by a Vector2.

method.name: get_center_x
method.description: Return true if tiles are to be centered in x coordinate (by default this is false and they are drawn from upper left cell corner).

method.name: get_center_y
method.description: Return true if tiles are to be centered in y coordinate (by default this is false and they are drawn from upper left cell corner).

method.name: get_collision_bounce
method.description: Return the collision bounce parameter.

method.name: get_collision_friction
method.description: Return the collision friction parameter.

method.name: get_collision_layer
method.description: Return the collision layer.

method.name: get_collision_mask
method.description: Return the collision mask.

method.name: get_collision_use_kinematic
method.description: Return whether the tilemap handles collisions as a kinematic body.

method.name: get_custom_transform
method.description: Return the custom transform matrix.

method.name: get_half_offset
method.description: Return the current half offset configuration.

method.name: get_mode
method.description: Return the orientation mode.

method.name: get_quadrant_size
method.description: Return the quadrant size.

method.name: get_tile_origin
method.description: Return the tile origin configuration.

method.name: get_tileset
method.description: Return the current tileset.

method.name: get_used_cells
method.description: Return an array of all cells containing a tile from the tileset (i.e. a tile index different from -1).

method.name: is_cell_transposed
method.description: Return whether the referenced cell is transposed, i.e. the X and Y axes are swapped (mirroring with regard to the (1,1) vector).

method.name: is_cell_x_flipped
method.description: Return whether the referenced cell is flipped over the X axis.

method.name: is_cell_y_flipped
method.description: Return whether the referenced cell is flipped over the Y axis.

method.name: is_y_sort_mode_enabled
method.description: Return the Y sort mode.

method.name: map_to_world
method.description: Return the absolute world position corresponding to the tilemap (grid-based) coordinates given as an argument. Optionally, the tilemap's potential half offset can be ignored.

method.name: set_cell
method.description: Set the tile index for the cell referenced by its grid-based X and Y coordinates. A tile index of -1 clears the cell. Optionally, the tile can also be flipped over the X and Y coordinates or transposed.

method.name: set_cell_size
method.description: Set the cell size.

method.name: set_cellv
method.description: Set the tile index for the cell referenced by a Vector2 of grid-based coordinates. A tile index of -1 clears the cell. Optionally, the tile can also be flipped over the X and Y axes or transposed.

method.name: set_center_x
method.description: Set tiles to be centered in x coordinate. (by default this is false and they are drawn from upper left cell corner).

method.name: set_center_y
method.description: Set tiles to be centered in y coordinate. (by default this is false and they are drawn from upper left cell corner).

method.name: set_collision_bounce
method.description: Set the collision bounce parameter. Allowable values range from 0 to 1.

method.name: set_collision_friction
method.description: Set the collision friction parameter. Allowable values range from 0 to 1.

method.name: set_collision_layer
method.description: Set the collision layer. Layers are referenced by binary indexes, so allowable values to describe the 20 available layers range from 0 to 2^20-1.

method.name: set_collision_mask
method.description: Set the collision masks. Masks are referenced by binary indexes, so allowable values to describe the 20 available masks range from 0 to 2^20-1.

method.name: set_collision_use_kinematic
method.description: Set the tilemap to handle collisions as a kinematic body (enabled) or a static body (disabled).

method.name: set_custom_transform
method.description: Set custom transform matrix, to use in combination with the custom orientation mode.

method.name: set_half_offset
method.description: Set an half offset on the X coordinate, Y coordinate, or none (use HALF_OFFSET_* constants as argument). Half offset sets every other tile off by a half tile size in the specified direction.

method.name: set_mode
method.description: Set the orientation mode as square, isometric or custom (use MODE_* constants as argument).

method.name: set_quadrant_size
method.description: Set the quadrant size, this optimizes drawing by batching chunks of map at draw/cull time. Allowed values are integers ranging from 1 to 128.

method.name: set_tile_origin
method.description: Set the tile origin to the tile center or its top-left corner (use TILE_ORIGIN_* constants as argument).

method.name: set_tileset
method.description: Set the current tileset.

method.name: set_y_sort_mode
method.description: Set the Y sort mode. Enabled Y sort mode means that children of the tilemap will be drawn in the order defined by their Y coordinate. A tile with a higher Y coordinate will therefore be drawn later, potentially covering up the tile(s) above it if its sprite is higher than its cell size.

method.name: world_to_map
method.description: Return the tilemap (grid-based) coordinates corresponding to the absolute world position given as an argument.

signal.name: settings_changed
signal.description: Signal indicating that a tilemap setting has changed.

constants.constant: Returned when a cell doesn't exist.
Half offset on the X coordinate.
Half offset on the Y coordinate.
Tile origin at its top-left corner.

class.name: TileSet
class.description: A TileSet is a library of tiles for a [TileMap]. It contains a list of tiles, each consisting of a sprite and optional collision shapes. Tiles are referenced by a unique integer ID.

method.name: tile_get_navigation_polygon

method.name: tile_get_navigation_polygon_offset
method.description: Return the offset of the tile's navigation polygon.

method.name: tile_get_occluder_offset
method.description: Return the offset of the tile's light occluder.

method.name: tile_get_region
method.description: Return the tile sub-region in the texture.

method.name: tile_get_shape
method.description: Return the shape of the tile.

method.name: tile_get_shape_offset
method.description: Return the shape offset of the tile.

method.name: tile_get_shapes
method.description: Return the array of shapes of the tile.

method.name: tile_get_texture
method.description: Return the texture of the tile.

method.name: tile_get_texture_offset
method.description: Return the texture offset of the tile.

method.name: tile_set_light_occluder
method.description: Set a light occluder for the tile.

method.name: tile_set_material
method.description: Set the material of the tile.

method.name: tile_set_name
method.description: Set the name of the tile, for descriptive purposes.

method.name: tile_set_navigation_polygon
method.description: Set a navigation polygon for the tile.

method.name: tile_set_navigation_polygon_offset
method.description: Set an offset for the tile's navigation polygon.

method.name: tile_set_occluder_offset
method.description: Set an offset for the tile's light occluder.

method.name: tile_set_region
method.description: Set the tile sub-region in the texture. This is common in texture atlases.

method.name: tile_set_shape
method.description: Set a shape for the tile, enabling physics to collide with it.

method.name: tile_set_shape_offset
method.description: Set the shape offset of the tile.

method.name: tile_set_shapes
method.description: Set an array of shapes for the tile, enabling physics to collide with it.

method.name: tile_set_texture
method.description: Set the texture of the tile.

method.name: tile_set_texture_offset
method.description: Set the texture offset of the tile.

class.name: Timer
class.description: Timer node. This is a simple node that will emit a timeout callback when the timer runs out. It can optionally be set to loop.

method.name: get_time_left
method.description: Return the time left for timeout in seconds if the timer is active, 0 otherwise.

method.name: get_timer_process_mode
method.description: Return the timer's processing mode.

method.name: get_wait_time
method.description: Return the wait time in seconds.

method.name: has_autostart
method.description: Return true if set to automatically start when entering the scene.

method.name: is_one_shot
method.description: Return true if configured as one-shot.

method.name: is_paused
method.description: Return if the timer is paused or not.

method.name: set_autostart
method.description: Set to automatically start when entering the scene.

method.name: set_one_shot
method.description: Set as one-shot. If enabled, the timer will stop after timeout, otherwise it will automatically restart.

method.name: set_paused
method.description: Set whether the timer is paused or not. A paused timer will be inactive until it is unpaused again.

method.name: set_timer_process_mode
method.description: Set the timer's processing mode (fixed or idle, use TIMER_PROCESS_* constants as argument).

method.name: set_wait_time
method.description: Set wait time in seconds. When the time is over, it will emit the timeout signal.

method.name: start
method.description: Start the timer.

method.name: stop
method.description: Stop (cancel) the timer.

signal.name: timeout
signal.description: Emitted when the time runs out.

constants.constant: Update the timer at fixed intervals (framerate processing).
Update the timer during the idle time at each frame.

class.name: Transform
class.description: Transform is used to store translation, rotation and scaling transformations. It consists of a Basis "basis" and Vector3 "origin". Transform is used to represent transformations of objects in space, and as such, determine their position, orientation and scale. It is similar to a 3x4 matrix.

method.name: Transform
method.description: Construct the Transform from four Vector3. Each axis corresponds to local basis vectors (some of which may be scaled).

method.name: Transform
method.description: Construct the Transform from a Basis and Vector3.

method.name: Transform
method.description: Construct the Transform from a Transform2D.

method.name: Transform
method.description: Construct the Transform from a Quat. The origin will be Vector3(0, 0, 0).

method.name: Transform
method.description: Construct the Transform from a Basis. The origin will be Vector3(0, 0, 0).

method.name: affine_inverse
method.description: Returns the inverse of the transfrom, under the assumption that the transformation is composed of rotation, scaling and translation.

method.name: inverse
method.description: Returns the inverse of the transform, under the assumption that the transformation is composed of rotation and translation (no scaling).

method.name: looking_at
method.description: Rotate the transform around the up vector to face the target.

method.name: orthonormalized
method.description: Returns a transfrom with the basis orthogonal (90 degrees), and normalized axis vectors.

method.name: rotated
method.description: Rotate the transform around given axis by phi. The axis must be a normalized vector.

method.name: scaled
method.description: Scale the transform by the specified 3D scaling factors.

method.name: translated
method.description: Translate the transform by the specified displacement.

method.name: xform
method.description: Transforms the given vector "v" by this transform.

method.name: xform_inv
method.description: Inverse-transforms vector "v" by this transform.

members.member: The basis is a matrix containing 3 [Vector3] as its columns: X axis, Y axis, and Z axis. These vectors can be interpreted as the basis vectors of local coordinate system travelling with the object.
The origin of the transform. Which is the translation offset.

class.name: Transform2D
class.description: 3x2 Matrix for 2D transforms.

method.name: affine_inverse
method.description: Return the inverse of the matrix.

class.name: Translation
class.description: Translations are resources that can be loaded/unloaded on demand. They map a string to another string.

method.name: get_locale

class.name: TranslationServer

class.name: Tree
class.brief_description: Control to show a tree of items.

method.name: get_column_title

method.name: get_pressed_button

method.name: get_root

method.name: get_selected

method.name: is_folding_hidden

method.name: set_allow_rmb_select

method.name: set_hide_folding

method.name: set_hide_root

method.name: set_select_mode
method.description: Set the selection mode. Use one of the [code]SELECT_*[/code] constants.

method.name: set_single_select_cell_editing_only_when_already_selected
method.description: Set whether the editing of a cell should only happen when it is already selected.

signal.name: button_pressed
signal.description: Emitted when a button on the tree was pressed (see [method TreeItem.add_button]).

signal.name: cell_selected
signal.description: Emitted when a cell is selected.

signal.name: custom_popup_edited
signal.description: Emitted when a cell with the [code]CELL_MODE_CUSTOM[/code] is clicked to be edited.

signal.name: empty_tree_rmb_selected

signal.name: item_activated

signal.name: item_collapsed

signal.name: item_edited
signal.description: Emitted when an item is editted.

signal.name: item_rmb_selected
